metadata.Title: CVE-2023-4236 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description: A flaw in the networking code handling DNS-over-TLS queries may cause`named` to terminate unexpectedly due to an assertion failure. This happenswhen internal data structures are incorrectly reused under significantDNS-over-TLS query load. This issue affects BIND 9 versions 9.18.0 through9.18.18 and 9.18.11-S1 through 9.18.18-S1.

criterions.comment: bind9: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
